subject: Re: MS Starts Here - updates doc
preview: @joel all good, it's perfect now thanks

full_threads.body: @joel all good, it's perfect now thanks
@heath Sorry I missed understand the description. Anyway, all good now on this one.

@joel note quite, you have changed ALL of the podcast backgrounds. It only needs to be changed on the author taxonomy page eg. https://msstartshere.org/author/msstartshere-jillian/ but currently they all seem to have turned yellow. thanks

@heath All good now on this one. Let me know if this is ok?

https://msstartshere.org/category/getting-to-know/
https://msstartshere.org/category/dealing-with-it/
@joel on the author archive/loop pages, can you please change the background of the podcast boxes to the yellow colour? Cheers ,

Hi Jillian, 

I have updated your access so that you change them for others if you like and I can see that your image is showing up. Eg. https://msstartshere.org/getting-to-know/5-talking-points-to-consider-bringing-up-at-the-next-appointment-with-your-neurologist/

Cool and thanks!



I've just re-adjusted the size of my bio pic and added some other details…. They're not showing up on the site at the moment, but I'll log off etc and wait for a refresh….



For the other authors - I'd have to log in as each of them and then adjust right?



Cheers!
















Jillian Kingsford Smith





m:



0408 877 344





w:



www.take20stories.com e: jillian@take20stories.com

Hi Jillian, 

Great good to hear and thanks for getting back to us.

In response to your questions: 

  1. Ideally a jpg or png, sized 500 x 500px
  2. They can update it themselves (or you can do it), by logging in to the backend and going to Profile > Biographical Info
  3. We have added the Instagram field
And yes the community page layout has now been updated.

@heath 
Can you let me know ideal profile image specs? Mine didn't upload properly and I'm unsure whether it was too large or an incorrect file type…
- Around 500x500 px
Can I update other people's bios or will they need to log in themselves and upload the info?
- They can update it themselves, by logging in to the backend Profile > Biographical Info
Can we replace the Facebook URL with one for Instagram?
- I have added a field for the instagram.

For the community page, I have updated the links on the home page. https://msstartshere.org/

Hi Heath Thanks for that. I've had a quick look and played with the profile section as well. Few quick questions:
  • Can you let me know ideal profile image specs? Mine didn't upload properly and I'm unsure whether it was too large or an incorrect file type…
  • Can I update other people's bios or will they need to log in themselves and upload the info?
  • Can we replace the Facebook URL with one for Instagram?
ALSO…. Can you turn on the new community page layout? It was the page we'd changed back to the mosaic page layout so as we could upload additional community content. Cheers and let me know if I can do anything else! Jillian Kingsford Smith m: 0408 877 344 w: www.take20stories.com e: jillian@take20stories.com

Hi Jillian, 

Great news, all of the updates have been completed. You will also see a field now where you can upload a bio picture of the author : ) 

Have a look at the attached screenshot and let me know if you would like me to create a quick 'how-to' video for you.

@heath @manuel All good now on this one. I've also add some custom fields where the client can upload an image (Should square)

https://msstartshere.org/treatments/update-on-stem-cell-research-ahsct/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@joel can you please tackle a couple of items please:

  1. On the post single pages, e.g. https://msstartshere.org/treatments/update-on-stem-cell-research-ahsct/ can you change the related articles to be masonry instead of the same height? Still only keep 3 there. AND remove the read time from video and podcast type articles. 
  2. How can we add a picture for each author, at the moment it's just a standard avatar. I think we may need to add a custom meta field on the user post type?

@manuel please work through the attached changes for msstartshere.org <http://msstartshere.org/> - I think there are some that are just notes (or ones that may need me to do some logos/graphics) thanks!

Hi Heath

Hope you had a great long weekend. I’m so sorry…. I just realised I hadn’t actually sent this to you… which may assist us greatly in tomorrow’s conversation!!!

Talk then…

JKS


Jillian Kingsford Smith
